author: Allison Prang
title: Elliott Management Targets Board Overhaul at Commvault
text:
Activist investor Elliott Management Corp. is pushing for changes at data-management software provider Commvault Systems Inc. and plans to nominate four new directors to the company’s board.
Elliott, which disclosed that it owns a 10.3% stake including derivatives in Commvault, said in a letter dated Monday to the company’s board that returns over the past handful of years have been “particularly disappointing” and that issues like falling operating income have hurt the company’s stock.
